full_text:
AMENDMENT OR REPEAL.
	(Added by Ord. No. 179,686*, Eff. 3/15/08.)

	This Communications Users Tax imposed by this article may be decreased, repealed or amended by the City Council, but may not be increased without a vote of the people as required in California Constitution Article XIIIC and California Government Code Section 53750(h).

* Note: Pursuant to the passage of Proposition S in a Special Election held on February 5, 2008, Ordinance No. 179,686 was adopted by the Council of the City of Los Angeles at its meeting of March 5, 2008.

1.name: Telephone, Electricity And Gas Users Tax
1.label: article

14.catch_line: Additional Powers And Duties Of Director Of Finance, Etc.

plain_text:
LOS ANGELES MUNICIPAL CODE

AMENDMENT OR REPEAL. (§ 21.1.13)

  AMENDMENT OR REPEAL.
	(Added by Ord. No. 179,686*, Eff. 3/15/08.)	This Communications Users Tax
imposed by this article may be decreased, repealed or amended by the City
Council, but may not be increased without a vote of the people as required in
California Constitution Article XIIIC and California Government Code Section
53750(h).* Note: Pursuant to the passage of Proposition S in a Special Election
held on February 5, 2008, Ordinance No. 179,686 was adopted by the Council of
the City of Los Angeles at its meeting of March 5, 2008.

This Communications Users Tax imposed by this article may be decreased, repealed or amended by the City Council, but may not be increased without a vote of the people as required in California Constitution Article XIIIC and California Government Code Section 53750(h).

* Note: Pursuant to the passage of Proposition S in a Special Election held on February 5, 2008, Ordinance No. 179,686 was adopted by the Council of the City of Los Angeles at its meeting of March 5, 2008.
